name: Bowderstone
overview: Bowderstone, nestled in the Lake District of England, is famous for its gigantic rock boulder, Bowder Stone. This natural monolith provides diverse climbing opportunities, including crack climbs and highball bouldering. The area is popular year-round, but summer offers the best conditions.

Bowderstone, ubicado en Lake District en Inglaterra, es famoso por su gigantesca roca, la Bowder Stone. Este monolito natural ofrece diversas oportunidades de escalada, incluyendo fisuras y boulder de gran altura. El área es popular durante todo el año, pero el verano ofrece las mejores condiciones.
